summary: i fixed issue with weapon not showing up,standalone contains new texture new mesh and of course its smithable  can play with both ravengers as they count as different mods lore friendly also
descriptionHtml:
CHANGELOG
2.00
ADDED NEW ONE  HANDED AND TWO HANDED FAST VERSIONS OF THE WEAPON TO THE SMITH DONT WORRY STILL HAS ITS AWESOME LOOK AND GIANT SIZE

FIXED ISSUE WERE WEAPON DID NOT SHOW UP  but if it doesnt show up at smith open console write help ravenger then write player.additem (then but the code you saw)

STANDALONE SO DONT WORRY ABOUT STUFF BEING REPLACED

Description
this is my mod it adds a weapon called the ebony ravenger no i did not mispelled it its lorefriendly smithable and looks awesome its is its own weapon so dont worry about stuff being replaced the sword is a two hander and is slightly bigger than the ebony greatsword and does more damage and crit dam but its also slower and balanced the weapon is also upgradeable .

smithing 
level 80
8 ebony ingots,4 leather strips, 1 malachite ingot
upgrade with
1 ebony ingot

install
drop to your skyrim data folder

also you guys can post images of the weapon on the mod page
Please endorse if you love it
credits
falloutfan44 of course because i made it all
author: falloutfan44

files.name: ebony ravenger new one hand and fast swords
